title: Calibration + BEV mapping MVP
summary: Implement pitch mapping that is robust to wide-angle distortion and imperfect markings.
Gate BEV outputs on calibration quality; always still deliver overlay/video diagnostics.
non_goals: Build a full interactive calibration UI (V1 uses minimal input formats and diagnostics).
Guarantee calibration success for every venue; prefer explicit failure with diagnostics.
success_criteria: Pitch templates + calibration input schemas are explicit, versioned, and support multiple venues/pitches.
Auto-fit emits reprojection error diagnostics and returns explicit failure semantics when uncertain.
Manual fallback + quality gating suppresses BEV output on low-quality calibration with clear reasons.

work_packages.title: Pitch model + mapping
items: TASK-CAL-001 Pitch templates + calibration input schema (multi-venue/pitch) + contract update.
TASK-CAL-002 Auto-fit from field markings + reprojection diagnostics + contract update.

work_packages.title: Manual fallback + quality gates
items: TASK-CAL-003 Manual correspondence fallback input + explicit calibration quality gating + contract update.
